page.title: 13 LOCAL COUNCILS
page.content:
THERE ARE THREE DIFFERENT COUNCILS WITHIN SLEAFORD AREA.THEY ARE THE SLEAFORD TOWN COUNCIL,NORTH KESTEVEN DISTRICT COUNCIL AND LINCOLNSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL. {SLEAFORD TOWN COUNCIL} ITS GENERAL JOB IS LOOKING AFTER THE CIVIC CENTRE AND THE APPEARANCE OF SLEAFORD.THE TOTAL NUMBER OF EMPLOYEES IS 11.THE AREA IT COVERS IS THE TOWN OF SLEAFORD. {NORTH KESTEVEN DISTRICT COUNCIL} ITS JOB IS REFUSE COLLECTING,PUBLIC HEALTH,LOOKING AFTER AND PROVIDING PUBLIC CONVENIENCES AND ALSO LOOKING AFTER PUBLIC CONVENIENCES.ITS MAIN JOB IS PROVIDING COUNCIL HOUSES FOR THE ELDERLY.
{CONTINUED ON NEXT PAGE}
